General.Name: Pick N Pay Stores Ltd
General.Description: Pick n Pay Stores Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail of food, grocery, clothing, liquor, and general merchandise products in South Africa and Rest of Africa. It owns and franchises hypermarkets, supermarkets, clothing stores, liquor stores, superstores, build stores, punch stores, and express stores under the Pick n Pay and Boxer brands. The company also offers its products through an online shopping platform www.pnp.co.za. Pick n Pay Stores Limited was founded in 1967 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.
General.Address: Pick n Pay Office Park, Cape Town, South Africa, 7708
